title: Cuff, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, linen, metal
Technique: satin embroidery stitch
description: Cuff from garment of priest in Greek Orthodox Church. Red satin on linen ground, embroidered in silver. Figure of a woman (Mary) centre, surrounded by floral motifs. Fitted with rings at side and cord for lacing. Inscription.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cuff, 19th century.Medium: silk, linen, metal
Technique: satin embroidery stitch. 1966-93-10.
